Klutcher.text: Klucher: It's your dog, Clarus. The developers took him! He's been kidnapped!!
Klucher: They want - no they NEED code!
Klucher: It seems the only thing that will appease them is writing APIs...

wwdc.text: There's a lot of developers here and they need code bad.

final.text: There is only one more API I need.
